mapper.sql: select msg_id, from_id, to_list as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type,is_external, contact from we_chat_contact_msg
mapper.select: select t.*, wc.name, wc.avatar from ( select receiver, msg_time,`action`, msg_type, contact from ( select to_list as receiver, `action` , msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where from_id = #{fromId} and is_external = 0 and room_id = '' union select from_id as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where FIND_IN_SET(#{fromId}, to_list) and is_external = 0 and room_id = '' order by msg_time desc ) as msg group by receiver order by msg.msg_time desc) t inner join we_customer wc on t.receiver = wc.external_userid and wc.first_user_id=#{fromId};

select t.*, ifnull(wu.user_name, wc.name) as name, ifnull(wu.head_image_url, wc.avatar) as avatar from (select receiver, msg_time, `action`, msg_type, contact from (select to_list as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where from_id = #{fromId} and room_id = ''
and contact like concat('%', #{contact}, '%')
union select from_id as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where FIND_IN_SET(#{fromId}, to_list) and room_id = ''
and contact like concat('%', #{contact}, '%')
order by msg_time desc) as msg group by receiver order by msg.msg_time desc) as t left join we_user wu on t.receiver = wu.user_id and (case when LOCATE('wm', t.receiver) or LOCATE('wo', t.receiver) then 0 else 1 end) = 1 left join we_customer wc on t.receiver = wc.external_userid and (case when LOCATE('wm', t.receiver) or LOCATE('wo', t.receiver) then 0 else 1 end) = 0;

select t.*, wu.user_name as name , wu.head_image_url as avatar from ( select receiver, msg_time,`action`, msg_type, contact from ( select to_list as receiver, `action` , msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where from_id = #{fromId} and is_external = 1 and room_id = '' union select from_id as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where FIND_IN_SET(#{fromId}, to_list) and is_external = 1 and room_id = '' order by msg_time desc ) as msg group by receiver order by msg.msg_time desc) t inner join we_user wu on t.receiver = wu.user_id;

select t.*, wg.group_name as name , '' as avatar from ( select receiver, msg_time,`action`, msg_type, contact from ( select room_id as receiver, `action` , msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where from_id = #{fromId} and room_id <> '' union select room_id as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where FIND_IN_SET(#{fromId}, to_list) and room_id <> '' order by msg_time desc ) as msg group by receiver order by msg.msg_time desc) t inner join we_group wg on t.receiver = wg.chat_id;
